data.comment: Today's referee, Robert Jones, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 46, Robert Jones has blown to start the second-half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Morgan Gibbs-White.
Sean Maguire is on a sub for Billy Bodin for Preston.
In the minute 57, The home team have replaced Scott Sinclair with Jayden Stockley. This is the second substitution made today by Alex Neil.
The away team replace Morgan Gibbs-White with Jay Fulton.
Alex Neil is making the team's third substitution at Deepdale with Paul Gallagher replacing Ryan Ledson.
In the minute 78, Wayne Routledge is replacing Jamal Lowe for the away team.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
